name: The Versallie Bike Tour
description:
We’ve organized a truly memorable day trip from Paris and a chance to experience this legendary village on bikes! After a short train ride from Paris, we’ll spend our day cruising through Versailles’ royal forests, into local food markets, to our picnic spot, by the Grand Canal, into Marie Antoinette’s village, and to the doors of the infamous chateau. Biking is the only way to experience all of Versailles in one day, and we’ll make it easy & fun- as we cruise leisurely through Versailles’ many cycle paths & forest trails.
This tour is not about stuffy history lessons & boring commentary. 
It’s about escaping the hustle & bustle of Paris. It’s about hearing all the fun stories & quirky anecdotes. It’s about food markets, cheese, wine, Marie Antoinette, tree-lined gardens, and a fantastic day in the French countryside.
